name: The Force (Ram G)
description:
Worlds are overrun with monsters. Use your magical powers to clean them and restore balance to all worlds. Travel to each world and destroy the monsters in them.
Drag objects to move them around and use them to attack the monsters. Heavier the objects, more the damage it will cause. Heavier the object, more the power required to move them. Use your special attack to cause more damage.
Destroy all enemies to open the portal to the next world. Clean them and restore the balance.
